默认参数下，**AntdCascader**以单选的模式，供用户进行末端叶节点的.en-us: In the default parameters, **AntdCascader** is used as a single choice mode to select the end leaf node.

悬浮层展开方位.en-us: The expansion direction of the floating layer

设置参数`placement`控制悬浮层展开方位。.en-us: Set the parameter `placement` to control the expansion direction of the floating layer.

设置参数`expandTrigger='hover'`鼠标悬停触发子选项展开。.en-us: Set the parameter `expandTrigger='hover'` to trigger the sub-option expansion on mouse hover.

设置参数`multiple=True`开启多选模式。.en-us: Set the parameter `multiple=True` to enable multiple choice mode.

设置参数`changeOnSelect=True`后当任意节点被选择时均对val.en-us: Set the parameter `changeOnSelect=True` to update the value when any node is selected.

设置参数`optionsMode='flat'`开启扁平options模式。.en-us: Set the parameter `optionsMode='flat'` to enable flat options mode.

设置参数`disabled=True`开启禁用状态。.en-us: Set the parameter `disabled=True` to enable the disabled status.

设置参数`showCheckedStrategy`控制已选项回填策略。.en-us: Set the parameter `showCheckedStrategy` to control the selected item backfill strategy.

设置参数`readOnly=True`开启只读状态。.en-us: Set the parameter `readOnly=True` to enable the readonly status.

设置参数`status`强制状态渲染。.en-us: Set the parameter `status` to force status rendering.

设置参数`optionsNodeKeyToLabel`，针对级联结构中的指定节点.en-us: Set the parameter `optionsNodeKeyToLabel` to define the component type content as the title for the specified node in the cascade structure.

设置参数`optionFilterProp`指定选项关键词搜索时的目标字段。.en-us: Set the parameter `optionFilterProp` to specify the target field when the option keyword search is performed.

设置参数`panelMode=True`开启面板模式，适用于一些需要内嵌适用的场.en-us: Set the parameter `panelMode=True` to enable the panel mode, which is suitable for scenarios requiring embedded applicable.

用于监听级联选择的选择事件。.en-us: Listen to the selection event of the cascade selection.
